title: Changing VRAM
message:
Hi.

Let's say I have 2 boards like 2915 and 2914 with different manufacturer VRAM chips. Are these interchangable, can different chpsets be used together?

title: Changing VRAM
message: see on schematic the VRAM straps....

title: Changing VRAM
message: No, just save yourself the headache and get matching chips.
